# The `FAddCombine` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddcombine">FAddCombine</a> is the class for optimizing an unsafe fadd/fsub along with its neighboring at most two instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>
